Class JavaFXPlot2D

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.ui.viewers.mathematics.analysis.plotting.backends.JavaFXPlot2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Plot2D
public class JavaFXPlot2D extends Object implements Plot2D
JavaFX-based 2D plotting implementation.

Always available (built into Java 8+).

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
